snippet: The two-time Olympic luge champion Armin Zoeggeler was selected to carry Italy’s flag at the opening ceremony of the Sochi Games in February.
abstract: Two-time Olympic luge champion Armin Zoeggeler is selected to carry Italy’s flag at the opening ceremony of the Sochi Games in 2014.
lead_paragraph: The two-time Olympic luge champion Armin Zoeggeler was selected to carry Italy’s flag at the opening ceremony of the Sochi Games in February.

headline.main: Luge Medalist to Lead Italy in Sochi
